column2: "Good job making it here, you two."
"Sukuna-hime and Kotoshiro! What's going on?"
"...the Kuronites attacked again. The White King ordered an ambush and locked himself in the castle."
"Well, I'm surprised he didn't just flee. The current White King is a staunch coward. He's so cowardly it's not worth the effort to make fun of him."
"The Shironians think that it's just the Kuronites starting all the fuss, but the situation's more complicated than that."
"I must reinforce the seal now, lest the Kuronites rouse [Magatsu] if it breaks."
"...The goal of those strange children might be just that. As such, I shall not allow them to do so."
"1. We'll help."
"2. ...Good luck!"
"Kaka. So this is what they call synchronicity."
"What are you saying! <%me>!"

"It's related to Dark Falz, and a
friend's in trouble you know? We have to help!"
"Matoi, Matoi, did you not know? That <%me> cracked a joke?"
"Now then, the strengthening seal has six points. I need to finish preparations in two places. We cannot afford to do them one by one."
"Accordingly, I want your assistance. Kotoshiro and I will head to one. The other one is up to you."
"Eh, but, we won't know what to do there?"
"Don't worry, I have a plan."
"This is a separate body of mine created by my arts. You may call her Tama-hime."
"I may be a separate body, but I have independent thought. Please take care of me, you two."
"If anything should happen, report to Tama-hime. She will then report it to us. We must get going."
"We should get going as well. Our destination is this way."
"Gray Gray Folklore"
"3章\u3000灰に塗れた伝承"
